definition: the act of conferring legality or sanction or formal warrant
details:
noun
- the act of conferring legality or sanction or formal warrant
= synonyms: authorisation, empowerment
- official permission or approval
= synonyms: authorisation, sanction, authority
- the power or right to give orders or make decisions
= synonyms: authorisation, dominance, potency, authority, say-so
- a document giving an official instruction or command
= synonyms: authorisation, mandate
